snippet: Terry L. Nichols, the convicted Oklahoma City bombing co-conspirator, purportedly wrote to the inmate Gregory Scarpa Jr. in 2010 describing where explosives were hidden in Mr. Nichols’s old house. The Federal Bureau of Investigation, which had searched the house multiple times, found the explosives after Mr. Scarpa’s tip.
